service.lab4 package¶

Submodules¶

service.lab4.ascii_art_generator module¶

service.lab4.ascii_art_generator.add_shadow(set_bit_list)[source]¶

Add shadow to ASCII-art. Check if there is a SYMBOL and SPACE next to each other. If so, replace SPACE with SHADOW.

service.lab4.ascii_art_generator.align(alignment, width, row_string)[source]¶
service.lab4.ascii_art_generator.create_ascii_art(FOLDER_PATH, settings_obj)[source]¶

Ask user for phrase and show ASCII-art.

Args:

FOLDER_PATH (str): Path to folder with ASCII-arts. settings_obj (AsciiArtSettings): Object with settings.

service.lab4.ascii_art_generator.render(char_str, color, regular_symbol, shadow_symbol, width, height, alignment, threed)[source]¶

Render ASCII-art.

service.lab4.ascii_art_generator.row_to_string(row, regular_symbol, shadow_symbol)[source]¶

Convert row items (SPACE, SYMBOL, SHADOW) to requested symbols.

service.lab4.ascii_art_generator.set_lines(char_list, width)[source]¶

Get number of lines for ASCII-art. If string is longer than width, split string into multiple lines.

service.lab4.ascii_art_generator.str_to_ascii_list(char_str)[source]¶

Convert string to list of ASCII codes.

service.lab4.ascii_art_generator.twod_to_threed(set_bit_list, column_item, char_item)[source]¶

Add 3D effect to ASCII-art. For the first character in the row, add SPACE to the beginning of the row. In ascending order, add SPACE to the beginning of the rows that represent a character.

service.lab4.font8x8 module¶

Module contents¶

nulp-spl
